name: Lena Schmidt
description: Lena leads the creative vision of the studio with over 15 years of experience in sustainable architecture and residential design. Her work blends form and function with a deep respect for context.

name: Marcus Lee
description: Marcus specializes in conceptual development and client engagement. With a background in urban planning, he brings big-picture thinking to every project, ensuring clarity and consistency from start to finish.

name: Sara Velasquez
description: Sara keeps everything on track—from scheduling to budgeting—with unmatched precision. Her experience spans commercial and residential projects, and she ensures smooth execution from concept to completion.

name: Jin Woo
description: Jin bridges the gap between design and delivery, managing documentation and construction phases. His strength lies in translating creative ideas into technically sound solutions.

name: Emily Roemer
description: Emily crafts interiors that enhance architecture, balancing texture, color, and light. She works closely with clients to bring warmth and personality into every space.
